# First Buffalo Wild Wing's 'GO' Location Completed by Horizon

Posted May 18, 2020

  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/Buffalo-Wild-Wings-GO-to-open-in-Georgia.jpg?itok=EjAbBZNJ)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/Buffalo-Wild-Wings-GO-to-open-in-Georgia.jpg?itok=GW9IDlqz "First Buffalo Wild Wing's 'GO' Location Completed by Horizon")



The Horizon team is excited to have partnered with Inspire Brands on their first Buffalo Wild Wings 'GO' location in Sandy Springs, GA. The new concept is designed to focus on delivery and take-out orders and features a walk-up counter, digital menu boards, and condensed seating and televisions for guests to enjoy while waiting for their orders. Please check out more information [in this article](https://www.nrn.com/casual-dining/buffalo-wild-wings-open-go-format-unit-georgia?NL=NRN-02_&Issue=NRN-02__20200512_NRN-02__832&sfvc4enews=42&cl=article_1_1&utm_rid=CPG06000003572509&utm_campaign=38054&utm_medium=email&elq2=ebfda46feaf8403aab65b12601cb4cbf).

Share via email

# Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill

Posted July 29, 2016

  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/007-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=lzRDyy2v)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/007-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=pZ1f6Fan "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 1")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/044-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=MoHj4mQ-)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/044-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=lAosA-xz "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 2")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/026-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=G1_7RD6I)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/026-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=V3toQzlw "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 3")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/030-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=bx1uqj-f)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/030-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=rz1QkpyO "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 4")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/040-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=888xnwHP)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/040-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=ZGAxrFj6 "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 5")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/042-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=Ew1GKBP_)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/042-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=tTyYizNI "Horizon Develops New Relationship with Chipotle Mexican Grill image 6")



  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/007-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=yKXdTsR-)](#slide-0-field_image-182)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/044-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=cux4dK-B)](#slide-1-field_image-182)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/026-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=5NHMeNU-)](#slide-2-field_image-182)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/030-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=fw22fJZs)](#slide-3-field_image-182)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/040-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=-ywPWkrV)](#slide-4-field_image-182)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/042-2313NorthMainSt-Chipotle-FULL-FULL.jpg?itok=MR2lFl2N)](#slide-5-field_image-182)



Horizon recently completed its first build-out for Chipotle Mexican Grill in High Point, NC. The project team of Josh Montague and Jimmy Lawhorne did an excellent job of managing this project and meeting Chipotle's expectations on our first project with them. The quality of our workmanship really shows as you can see from the photos. Horizon has since begun multiple other projects for Chipotle throughout the Southeast. We look forward to a great working relationship for many years to come.

Share via email

# Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical

Posted January 19, 2016

  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/ext%201.jpg?itok=cWPO77f2)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/ext%201.jpg?itok=B85sz6II "Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical image 1")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/int%202.jpg?itok=uclZUZBw)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/int%202.jpg?itok=9HwxbWPH "Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical image 2")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/int%203.jpg?itok=MuY2pO8L)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/int%203.jpg?itok=jvt4aN2v "Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical image 3")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/int%204.jpg?itok=ly91IOE3)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/int%204.jpg?itok=2mgk6SyT "Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical image 4")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/int%207.jpg?itok=blR7CMuq)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/int%207.jpg?itok=ko_RnPBQ "Horizon Completes Challenging Restaurant Remodel for Pollo Tropical image 5")



  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/ext%201.jpg?itok=V1z3wzVv)](#slide-0-field_image-181)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/int%202.jpg?itok=k7-AnuzC)](#slide-1-field_image-181)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/int%203.jpg?itok=2SqK2mgy)](#slide-2-field_image-181)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/int%204.jpg?itok=Fzskd-n3)](#slide-3-field_image-181)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/int%207.jpg?itok=Dr9J6ee8)](#slide-4-field_image-181)



This past year ended with Horizon executing another challenging restaurant remodel for Fiesta Restaurant Group. Fiesta's existing Taco Cabana store in Snellville, GA needed to be converted to a Pollo Tropical in a tight timeframe. The project consisted of extensive interior and exterior improvements along with kitchen re-configuration and upgrades and the finished product looks great. Horizon has now completed a number of restaurant remodels for FRGI in their Orlando, Nashville, and Atlanta markets. 

Horizon's team for this project consisted of project manager, Chad Nolter, and field superintendent, Bobby Nama. Great job team on another successful project and satisfied customer!

Share via email

# Horizon Continues to Achieve Excellence in Restaurant Remodeling

Posted October 30, 2015

  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/counter.jpg?itok=IjILF1iX)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/counter.jpg?itok=IyPa3ki5 "Horizon Continues to Achieve Excellence in Restaurant Remodeling image 1")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/lobby%202.jpg?itok=737GtqXk)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/lobby%202.jpg?itok=GjmR_uUA "Horizon Continues to Achieve Excellence in Restaurant Remodeling image 2")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/lobby%203.jpg?itok=1Y3BaU6X)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/lobby%203.jpg?itok=APv3OHrN "Horizon Continues to Achieve Excellence in Restaurant Remodeling image 3")
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_slide/public/field/image/bath.jpg?itok=HzFBePO0)](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/full/public/field/image/bath.jpg?itok=PW_KDMUd "Horizon Continues to Achieve Excellence in Restaurant Remodeling image 4")



  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/counter.jpg?itok=C_Kqs7TV)](#slide-0-field_image-179)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/lobby%202.jpg?itok=1tsSEXV7)](#slide-1-field_image-179)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/lobby%203.jpg?itok=fgmoIyft)](#slide-2-field_image-179)
  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/bath.jpg?itok=C7QUHVKA)](#slide-3-field_image-179)



It's been another successful year as Horizon continues to raise the bar in our restaurant remodel programs. We are proud that our projects consistently meet and exceed the highest standards for quality and customer satisfaction. We look forward to the future as we continue to establish ourselves as one of the most trusted restaurant and retail remodel contractors in the country. Please enjoy these beautfiul photos from a recently completed remodel for Chick-fil-A in Commerce, GA.

Share via email

Posted August 26, 2015

  * [![](https://www.horizonc.com/sites/default/files/styles/galleryformatter_thumb/public/field/image/50.jpg?itok=PkAVdwha)](#slide-7-field_image-178)



The Horizon team recently completed an interior remodel at the Mellow Mushroom restaurant in Murfreesboro, TN. The project includes updated finishes and features throughout the restaurant in addition to a [new kitchen flooring system](http://www.eco-gripfloor.com/). Our very own superintendent and project manager got their creative juices flowing in designing a custom speaker stand to enhance the existing VW bus feature. The Home Grown Industries art team also did an awesome job on all of the new murals and artwork. 

The majority of the work was completed overnight allowing the store to remain open and continue to serve their customers. Horizon specializes in 'open-store' remodels which require a high level of coordination, execution, and cleanliness. This approach allows our clients to continue with their business while we work behind the scenes.

Great job by our field superintendent, Adam Kelley, and the entire project team! We hope you enjoy the photos of the finished product.
